domain.die

Class Cup

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.die.Cup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Cup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that handles rolling dices and related controls.
    Author:
    Team Pennybags
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Overview:
    This class is created using pure fabrication for rolling dices, getting the face values and getting the sum of them considering the rolling methods with different kinds of dices. It implements Serializable to be able to sent through object stream via network

      • rollTwoRegularDices

        public void rollTwoRegularDices()

      • rollThreeRegularDices

        public void rollThreeRegularDices()
        Rolls 3 regular dices and sets the face value of speed die to empty
        Requires:
        regular dice and speed die are not null and the face value of regular dices are between 1 and 6
        Effects:
        sets the face value of speed die to empty and rolls 3 regular dice and fills the faceValues array with the face values of 3 regular dice.
        Modifies:
        this, regular dice and speed die

      • isEven

        public boolean isEven()

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        finds the summation of the face values of dices rolled
        Returns:
        the total value of the cup which determines the movement amount of the token
        Requires:
        two regular dice and a speedDie and their face values are not null
        Effects:
        nothing
        Modifies:
        nothing
